articles.author: Sam Byford
articles.title: Oppo shows off concept rolling phone and AR glasses - The Verge
articles.description: Oppo has held its Inno Day 2020 event. This year the company demonstrated a new set of AR glasses and a concept smartphone with an expandable “rolling” screen.
articles.content: Will 2021 be the year of rollables?
